title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Concorde - using the autopilot
description:
In this video we are going to look at how to use the autopilot in the Concorde. We are going to use the most important functions which you will probably also use. Some functions will be discussed in a future video like the auto landing and the buttons to change the selected course.

If you would like to try Concorde yourself download it from the site below:
https://www.justflight.com/product/dc-designs-concorde-microsoft-flight-simulator
